categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Rebel Alliance used a class of shuttle during the Galactic Civil War. It was boxy in shape, had a trapezoidal cockpit, and three engines. Nine were deployed along with Rogue Squadron during the Assault on the Mako-Ta Space Docks to disperse the override codes and rescue Alliance dignitaries from the Mako-Ta Space Docks.
The shuttles appear in the 2018 Marvel Comics issue Star Wars 55.
